faqs.a: FeedHive is an AI-powered social media management platform that helps you create, schedule, and automate posts across multiple channels.
Plans start at around $19/month (Creator plan), $29/month (Brand plan), $99/month (Business plan), up to $299/month (Agency plan) depending on features and number of accounts.

faqs.q: Does FeedHive offer a free trial?
faqs.a: Yes, FeedHive offers a 7-day free trial for all plans.

faqs.q: Can I use FeedHive for multiple clients?
faqs.a: Yes, the Business and Agency plans support multiple workspaces, many social accounts, and the Agency plan offers white-label support.

faqs.q: What social platforms does FeedHive support?
faqs.a: Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, Reels, LinkedIn, Threads.

faqs.q: What features does the AI assistant provide?
faqs.a: The AI assistant generates post ideas, improves content for engagement/virality, suggests hashtags, and recommends ways to optimize your posts.
Yes, the Agency plan allows custom branding, white-label dashboards, and client access management.

faqs.q: What kind of automation does FeedHive provide?
faqs.a: Recurring posts, content recycling, approval workflows, scheduling, team collaboration with workspaces and multiple users.
Yes, it provides post analytics and performance tracking, as well as a social inbox to manage comments across platforms.

faqs.q: What are the pros of FeedHive?
faqs.a: Easy to use UI, AI content generation, multi-platform scheduling, good value for small teams or creators, strong automation and collaboration features.

faqs.q: What are the cons or limitations?
faqs.a: Analytics may not be as deep for enterprise-level insights, some users report minor bugs, integrations for certain platforms may be limited, higher tiers needed for large-scale use.

faqs.q: How do I start using FeedHive?
faqs.a: Sign up on the website, choose a plan, connect your social accounts, upload your content, and start scheduling posts.

faqs.q: Is FeedHive suitable for small teams?
faqs.a: Yes, it's designed for creators, small brands, startups, and agencies managing multiple clients.

faqs.q: Does FeedHive integrate with third-party tools?
faqs.a: Yes, it supports Zapier, APIs, webhooks, and automated workflows.
Currently, FeedHive is primarily web-based; mobile app availability may be limited.
